setup-worktree-unix: cd tools/myproject && poetry run ruff check src/ --quiet || echo 'âš ï¸ Ruff found issues'
cd tools/myproject && poetry run mypy src/myproject --ignore-missing-imports --no-error-summary 2>/dev/null || echo 'âš ï¸ Mypy found issues'
cd tools/myproject && poetry run pytest tests/unit/ -m fast -q --tb=no 2>/dev/null || echo 'âš ï¸ Some tests failed'
setup-worktree-windows: if not exist tools\myproject\myproject.yaml copy "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\tools\myproject\myproject.yaml" tools\myproject\myproject.yaml 2>nul
if not exist tools\myproject\secrets xcopy /E /I /Q "%ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\tools\myproject\secrets" tools\myproject\secrets 2>nul
cd tools\myproject && poetry run ruff check src\ --quiet || echo Ruff found issues
cd tools\myproject && poetry run mypy src\myproject --ignore-missing-imports --no-error-summary 2>nul || echo Mypy found issues
cd tools\myproject && poetry run pytest tests\unit\ -m fast -q --tb=no 2>nul || echo Some tests failed
